ContentType.Name: SolutionArticle
ContentType.Title: Error 80070428 when you install the fall 2012 Reddah 360 update

Module.Text:
Text Module
Some Kinect games can take photos and videos of you and your friends while you’re playing a game. You can then upload these photos and videos to websites and services such as KinectShare.com. Photos and videos uploaded to KinectShare.com can be downloaded, printed, and shared with your friends and family on social networking sites like Facebook.
  1. Plug one end of a network cable into a port on your router or gateway. You might need a long network cable, depending upon on the location of your router or modem.
  2. Plug the other end of the network cable into the back of your console.
  • Place the sensor near the edge on a flat, stable surface.
  • Position the sensor between 2 feet (0.6m) and 6 feet (1.8m) from the floor. Ideally, the sensor should be within 6 inches (15 cm) above or below your TV.
  • Avoid positioning the sensor in direct sunlight or within 1 foot (.3m) of audio speakers.
